Dear Madam,
With reference to your letter of 15th May, regarding
your Fact Sheet Service, which has been referred to me.
I have now had an opportunity of looking at our
previous correspondence with your Association and I find that in
August 1953 ve arranged to send you copies of The Listener,
Radio Times and BBC Quarterly, and in return you have been sending
us your Newsletter and the other publications which you issue from
time to time. The BBC Quarterly is no longer published but we are
still sending you Radio Times and The Listener.
In view of this I trust that we may continue to
exchange publications on this basis and that it will not be
necessary for us to register a subscription for $2*50.
I am, therefore, returning your invoice reference
No. 73241 and I shall be grateful to have your confirmation that
this arrangement is acceptable to you.
With best wishes,
(R. C. Hall)
MC Circulation Manager
